mapper.insert: insert into met_data_column(dw_id, tbl_name, col_name, col_type, col_comment) select #{dwID} as dw_id, tbl_name, col_name, col_type, col_comment from view_met_data_column where not exists(select 1 from met_data_column where tbl_name = view_met_data_column.tbl_name and col_name = view_met_data_column.col_name);
mapper.update: update met_data_column t1 inner join view_met_data_column t2 on concat(t1.tbl_name, t1.col_name) = concat(t2.tbl_name, t2.col_name) set t1.col_type = t2.col_type, t1.col_comment = t2.col_comment
UPDATE met_data_column t1 SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE concat(t1.tbl_name, t1.col_name) not in (select concat(t2.tbl_name, t2.col_name) from view_met_data_column t2)
